meanings.definition: The quality of being modest or humble.
meanings.sent1: Her unpretentiousnesses shone through in her simple, kind gestures.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the unpretentiousnesses of this small, cozy cafe.
meanings.sent3: His unpretentiousnesses made him the least likely candidate for the flashy role.
meanings.sent4: The unpretentiousnesses of the old bookstore felt like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The unpretentiousnesses of the handmade gift touched her heart deeply.

meanings.sent1: The unpretentiousnesses of the restaurant's decor created a welcoming atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: I admire her unpretentiousnesses; she is always genuine and sincere.
meanings.sent3: His unpretentiousnesses in fashion made him stand out in a sea of flashy outfits.
meanings.sent4: The unpretentiousnesses of the small town were a breath of fresh air compared to the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The unpretentiousnesses of the handwritten note added a personal touch to the gift.
